table_description: This table contains metadata about the slide microscopy (SM) series available in IDC. Each row corresponds to a DICOM series, and contains attributes specific to SM series, such as the pixel spacing at the maximum resolution layer, the power of the objective lens used to digitize the slide, and the anatomic location from where the imaged specimen was collected. This table can be joined with the main index table using the `SeriesInstanceUID` column.

columns.name: embeddingMedium_CodeMeaning
columns.description: embedding medium used for the slide preparation

columns.name: tissueFixative_CodeMeaning
columns.description: tissue fixative used for the slide preparation

columns.name: staining_usingSubstance_CodeMeaning
columns.description: staining substances used for the slide preparation

columns.name: min_PixelSpacing_2sf
columns.description: pixel spacing in mm at the maximum resolution layer, rounded to 2 significant figures

columns.name: max_TotalPixelMatrixColumns
columns.description: width of the image at the maximum resolution

columns.name: max_TotalPixelMatrixRows
columns.description: height of the image at the maximum resolution

columns.name: ObjectiveLensPower
columns.description: power of the objective lens of the equipment used to digitize the slide

columns.name: primaryAnatomicStructure_code_designator_value_str
columns.description: anatomic location from where the imaged specimen was collected

columns.name: primaryAnatomicStructure_CodeMeaning
columns.description: code tuple for the anatomic location from where the imaged specimen was collected

columns.name: primaryAnatomicStructureModifier_code_designator_value_str
columns.description: additional characteristics of the specimen, such as whether it is a tumor or normal tissue (when available)

columns.name: primaryAnatomicStructureModifier_CodeMeaning
columns.description: code tuple for additional characteristics of the specimen, such as whether it is a tumor or normal tissue (when available)

columns.name: illuminationType_code_designator_value_str
columns.description: illumination type used during slide digitization

columns.name: illuminationType_CodeMeaning
columns.description: code tuple for the illumination type used during slide digitization

columns.name: admittingDiagnosis_code_designator_value_str
columns.description: admitting diagnosis associated with the specimen imaged on the slide (when available)

columns.name: admittingDiagnosis_CodeMeaning
columns.description: code tuple for the admitting diagnosis associated with the specimen imaged on the slide (when available)
